svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Years lived with disability or disease burden vs. GDP per capita, 2016
Expected years living with disability or disease burden versus gross domestic product (GDP) per capita, measured in
2011 international-$ which correct for inflation and cross-country price differences.
Years lived with disability or disease burden
Source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease; World Bank - WDI
